task.instruction: Your user ID is CUST996230. You have an existing active loan, with the ID LN-241201-kFWZ, with a principal of $41,690.46 at 9.52% interest rate. First, you want to understand your current loan by checking its amortization schedule. Then, since you have a good risk score of 668, you'd like to apply for an additional home improvement loan of $25,000 with a 48-month term, with the same interest rate. After applying for the new loan, you want to see its amortization schedule to understand your combined monthly obligations.
